abstract: Nepalese official reports police fired guns and used teargas to quell demonstrations in Rangeli and Dainiya by ethnic Madhesi, killing three and wounding several others; 13 police officers are also wounded in clash.
lead_paragraph: Members of the Madhesi group have been demanding changes to Nepal’s new Constitution, which they say dilutes their political voice.

headline.main: Nepal Police Fire on Madhesi Protesters, Killing at Least 3
headline.print_headline: Asia; Nepal: Police Shoot at Protesters, Killing at Least 3

snippet: Members of the Madhesi group have been demanding changes to Nepal’s new Constitution, which they say dilutes their political voice.
